name: Popover
description: A popover component from Fluent UI that displays contextual content in a floating container positioned relative to a trigger element.

props.name: children
props.description: Content to display inside the popover

props.name: defaultOpen
props.description: Default open state for uncontrolled popover

props.name: onOpenChange
props.description: Callback fired when the popover open state changes

props.name: withArrow
props.description: Whether the popover should display an arrow pointing to the trigger

props.name: trapFocus
props.description: Whether focus should be trapped within the popover
